  • support and contact channels

support and contact channels¶

Getting in contact:

  • file a report on the issue tracker
  • join the tox-dev mailing list for tox related questions, discussions and release announcements.
  • fork the github repository and submit merge/pull requests (see the developers help page – Developers FAQ)
  • hang out on the irc.freenode.net #pylib channel
  • join the Testing In Python (TIP) mailing list for tool transcneding discussions about these topics

paid professional support¶

contact holger (holger-twitter) at merlinux.eu, an association of experienced well-known Python developers.
